entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dome Creek
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of wet flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers this morning. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
